com.revature.jfbennatt.ers.services

Class EmployeeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.jfbennatt.ers.services.EmployeeService

  • public class EmployeeService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service layer that acts as an intermediary between the front end and the database. The main functionality provided is encryption of the password and session token. PasswordEncryptor and StrongTextEncryptor are used for encryption. This class will not be functional without the environment variable DB_KEY.
    Author:
    Jared F Bennatt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmployeeService()
      Sets up text encryptor.

    • Method Detail

      • deleteSessionTokenByToken

        public boolean deleteSessionTokenByToken(java.lang.String encryptedToken)
        Removes the session token for the user (specified by their current session token).
        Parameters:
        encryptedToken - The encrypted token given by the client.
        Returns:
        Whether or not a session token was actually deleted.

      • getEmployeeByToken

        public Employee getEmployeeByToken(java.lang.String encryptedToken)
        Get/authenticate an employee from their (encrypted) session token. Although technically unnecessary, this method re-encrypts the unencrypted token from the database, so the the client should update their session token (because it will change—although the old encrypted token would still work unless the token is actually changed in the database).
        Parameters:
        encryptedToken - This is the encrypted session token that the user provides (the token is not encrypted in the database).
        Returns:
        The authenticated Employee object (all fields will be set except for the password) or null if the employee isn't found. The token in the Employee object will be encrypted so that the client cannot know the actual value of the token.
        See Also:
        EmployeeDao.getEmployeeByToken(String)

      • loginEmployee

        public Employee loginEmployee(java.lang.String email,
                              java.lang.String password)
        Attempts to login an employee. This will return an Employee object that will have (at least) the employee id, session token, and first and last name set.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the employee trying to log in.
        password - Password of the Employee trying to log in.
        Returns:
        An Employee object representing the logged in employee or null if the employee doesn't exist or isn't authenticated.

      • setEmployeeDao

        public void setEmployeeDao(EmployeeDao empDao)
        Sets the EmployeeDao to be used by this service.
        Parameters:
        empDao - EmployeeDao to be used by this service.

      • submitRequest

        public boolean submitRequest(Employee emp,
                             java.lang.String description,
                             java.lang.String amount,
                             java.lang.String reimbDateString,
                             java.util.Date submitDate)
        Submits a reimbursement request.
        Parameters:
        emp - Employee requesting reimbursement
        description - Description of the reimbursement.
        amount - Amount (as a String) to be reimbursed.
        reimbDateString - Date the expense was incurred.
        submitDate - Date the request was submitted.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this request was successfully submitted.

      • getAllReimbursementsByEmployeeId

        public java.util.List<Reimbursement> getAllReimbursementsByEmployeeId(int empId)
        Returns all reimbursement requests for a given employee
        Parameters:
        empId - Employee id to get requests from
        Returns:
        A List of Reimbursement objects for this employee.

      • changeProfile

        public boolean changeProfile(Employee employee)
        Changes the profile for this employee by accepting the updated values. If the password is null, it is not updated.
        Parameters:
        employee - Values to update (the employee id won't change).
        Returns:
        Whether or not this was successful.

      • getPendingReimbursementsByEmployeeId

        public java.util.List<Reimbursement> getPendingReimbursementsByEmployeeId(int empId)
        Gets all of the pending requests from this employee id.
        Parameters:
        empId - Employee id of the employee to fetch requests from.
        Returns:
        List of Reimbursement objects for this employee.

      • getProcessedReimbursementsByEmployeeId

        public java.util.List<Reimbursement> getProcessedReimbursementsByEmployeeId(int empId)
        Gets all of the processed requests from this employee id.
        Parameters:
        empId - Employee id of the employee to fetch requests from.
        Returns:
        List of Reimbursement objects for this employee.

      • getallEmployeesExceptManager

        public java.util.List<Employee> getallEmployeesExceptManager(int manId)
        Returns a list of all employees excluding the manager passed as an argument.
        Parameters:
        manId - Employee of the id of the manager (to be excluded from the list).
        Returns:
        List of Employee objects (or null if there is an error). An empty list is not an error.

      • getAllPendingRequestsExceptManager

        public java.util.List<Reimbursement> getAllPendingRequestsExceptManager(int manId)
        Returns a list of all reimbursements that are pending and aren't from this manager.
        Parameters:
        manId - Employee id of the requesting manager
        Returns:
        List of Reimbursement objects or null if there is an error (an empty list is not an error).

      • approveRequest

        public boolean approveRequest(int manId,
                              int reimbId)
        Approves a reimbursement by the manager.
        Parameters:
        manId - Id of manager approving request.
        reimbId - Id of reimbursement being approved.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this was successful.

      • rejectRequest

        public boolean rejectRequest(int manId,
                             int reimbId)
        Rejects a reimbursement by the manager.
        Parameters:
        manId - Id of manager rejecting request.
        reimbId - Id of reimbursement being rejected.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this was successful.

      • getAllProcessedRequests

        public java.util.List<Reimbursement> getAllProcessedRequests()
        Returns all processed requests.
        Returns:
        List of Reimbursement objects or null if there's an error (an empty list is not an error).
